<<<<<<< HEAD
The Natives an answer to The foreigners. Tutchin, John, 1661?-1707.
19 p.
Sold by John Nutt ..., London : [1700]
Date of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1965 imprints. "Note, that the author has taken care to follow the method of The foreigner as near as reasonably he could, by which means this poem wants the coherence that otherwise it might have had, and the reader may likewise observe that every line of this poem is clos'd with the very same word The foreigner has made use of." The natives and The foreigners on facing pages. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

"Note, that the author has taken care to follow the method of The foreigner as near as reasonably he could, by which means this poem wants the coherence that otherwise it might have had, and the reader may likewise observe that every line of this poem is clos'd with the very same word The foreigner has made use of." The natives and The foreigners on facing pages. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
